additional information.from sentence: First , we explore the effect of additional information by adopting a pretrained language model ( LM ) to compute the vector representation of the input text .

different objective functions.from sentence: Last , we explore the effect of different objective functions ( listwise and pointwise learning ) .

select.from sentence: Following this study , we select an ELMo language model for this study .

applicability.from sentence: We investigate the applicability of transfer learning ( TL ) using a large - scale corpus that is created for a relevant - sentence - selection task ( i.e. , question - answering NLI ( QNLI ) dataset ) .

one of the baseline models.name: Comp - Clip
one of the baseline models.from sentence: Second , we further enhance one of the baseline models , Comp - Clip ( refer to the discussion in 3.1 ) , for the target QA task by proposing a novel latent clustering ( LC ) method .

latent cluster information.from sentence: The LC method computes latent cluster information for target samples by creating a latent memory space and calculating the similarity between the sample and the memory .

true - label question - answer pairs.from sentence: By an endto - end learning process with the answer-selection task , the LC method assigns true - label question - answer pairs to similar clusters .
